mapper.select: select comp_pk ,subject ,to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date" ,to_char(start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_time" ,to_char(end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_time" from competition where c_no = #{c_no} order by comp_pk desc

select g_no ,content ,to_char(gonggoreg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "gonggoreg_date" ,to_char(opendate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "opendate" ,to_char(closedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "closedate" from gonggo where c_no = #{c_no} order by g_no desc
select m.c_no, m.name, m.ceo_name, i.business_industry, i.rec_count from company_mem m, company_info i where m.c_no = #{c_no} and m.c_no = i.c_no

select m.name ,to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')) - to_number( case when substr(m.jumin_num, 7, 1) = '1' then '19' when substr(m.jumin_num, 7, 1) = '2' then '19' else '20' end || substr(m.jumin_num, 1, 2) ) as age ,m.sex ,g.content ,r.resume_no ,p.p_no from pertocom p, gonggo g, person_mem m,resume r where p.g_no = #{g_no} and g.g_no = p.g_no and m.p_no = p.p_no and p.p_no=r.p_no

select m.c_no, m.name, i.url, LISTAGG(w.welfare_code, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY w.welfare_code) as "welfare_code2", i.volume, i.field_code, i.birth, m.ceo_name, m.call, m.business_no, i.sales, i.addr, i.emp_no, i.sal_avg, m.email from company_mem m JOIN company_info i ON m.c_no = i.c_no JOIN company_welfare w ON m.c_no = w.c_no where m.c_no = #{c_no} group by m.c_no, m.name, i.url, i.volume, i.field_code, i.birth, m.ceo_name, m.call, m.business_no, i.sales, i.addr, i.emp_no, i.sal_avg, m.email
mapper.update: update company_info set url = #{url}, volume = #{volume}, field_code = #{field_code}, birth = #{birth}, sales = #{sales}, addr = #{addr1}||' '||#{addr2}||' '||#{addr3}, emp_no = #{emp_no}, sal_avg = #{sal_avg} where c_no = #{c_no}
update company_mem set name = #{name}, ceo_name = #{ceo_name}, call = #{call}, business_no = #{business_no}, email = #{email}||#{email2} where c_no = #{c_no} and pwd = #{pwd}
